title: Busou Shinki (Busou Shinki: Armored War Goddess)
synopsis: The slice-of-life battle story is set in a future that has neither World War III nor an alien invasionâ€”just an ordinary future set after our current age. In this world, robots are part of everyday life, and they contribute in various aspects of society. "Shinki" are 15-centimeter-tall (about 6-inch-tall) cute partners made to assist humans. Equipped with intelligence and emotions, they devote themselves to serving their "Masters."
